CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "Local taxes exempt"), "04; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State and Local Sales Tax Exempt"), "32; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "All State and Local Gross Receipts Tax (GRT) Exempt"), "21; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State Excise Tax Exempt (Includes FL CST)"), "26; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State Excise and Local Communications Tax Exempt"), "30; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "Local Utility Users Tax Exempt (includes CA local UUTs)"), "41; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State Excise Tax Exempt and Local Surcharge Exempt"), "42; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "City level taxes exempt"), "44; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "County level taxes exempt"), "47; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State Taxes Exempt"), "02; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State and Local Taxes Exempt"), "06; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "Local Right of Way Fees Exempt"), "13; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "All State and Local E911s Exempt"), "14; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "Only Apply Federal Universal Service Fund"), "19; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "All PUC Fees Exempt"), "20; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "All State Universal Service Fund Fees Exempt"), "22; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "Federal Universal Service Fund Exempt"), "24; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State Level Sales Tax Exempt"), "31; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "State Franchise Fee"), "45; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "Local Franchise Fee"), "46; ","") & IF( INCLUDES(Tax_Exempt_Description__c , "Los Angeles Communications Users Tax Exempt"), "61; ","") & IF( Sales_Tax_Exempt__c == false, "00; ","")
CustomField.label: Tax Exempt Code
